title: Yasuo needs a new skin.
body:
yasuo{{champion:157}}  needs a new skin TBH like, i like the bloodmoon - Dawnbringer + project and normal, but he just needs a new one...like a badass one.., i'm a Yasuo main and I DON'T CARE what you say but i like playing as yasuo, his easy to play and do combos but also dont rework him, people are just trash because they cant beat him, anyways back to skins.. we need a new skin for him, many people out there are probably still waiting for a good skin for him, like a windmaster skin or championship skin or a deadwind yasuo skin etc. i dont know but we need one, i may come up with some ideas..if i have time i could send a picture in the player creation page and see if player/people like it... anyways hopefully one can come out soon. no hate and srry for bad english 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Sure, why not.  
The rich get richer and the poor stay poor.

We wouldn't want to give skins to champs like Sol or Kindred who haven't had one in years _(or at all)_, when we can give them to Yasuo, who already has a skin from each of the two most popular skin lines in league, as well as a legendary skin _(one of the better legendaries too)_. Not to mention all this is on top of his release skin.

All goods, Sol/Kindred/Taliyah can wait, we wouldn't want Yasuo to miss out on his 5th skin.

Being a Katana-wielding Cyborg, or a dark-flame Demon just isn't cool enough for me either tbh. We have to find him a **actual** badass skin, none of this Lone Cowboy or Blood Samurai shit either.

Meanwhile, make a _**Dragon**_ champ, give them a _**Fire**_ skin, that'll give players enough variety to last the next few years or so! No problem!
